text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Since you killed the former CEO of Chicago Pizza, @THEHermanCain, I guess you need a new Covid-19 pizza delivery fall guy for your pathetic, low-attendance, white supremacist MAGAt rallies. #BeBester
